page.title: 07My Day (Child) Michael Green
page.content: Mum wakes me at 7-30 & I get washed & dressed.For Breakfast I have a choice of Cereals & usually an egg on toast.I drink my tea black.I go to School by car & arrive at 8-30 a.m.My School is St. Giles R.C. Primary.We start at 8- -55.First we change our shoes ready for Assembly.There is often Music playing(not Duran Duran).We pray,sing& hear information. The main morning lessons are Religion,Maths & English. During Playtimes we play Football, Cricket,Flicky or Tick.Afternoons are spent on Reading,Art,Drama,P.E.,Inte- -grated Studies etc.School ends at 3-30.I see lovely moorland views as I walk home.After Tea we say a family Rosary,after which I go out to play or watch T.V. I am usually in bed and asleep by 9a.m.>
